    • Method Detail

      • initEncoding

        public void initEncoding(int[] pcmBufferSize,
                int[] mp3BufferSize)
        Description copied from interface: GenericEncoder
        Starts an encoding process.

        The required size of source PCM and target MP3 byte buffers are returned using the first array item of the provided parameters.

        Specified by:
        initEncoding in interface GenericEncoder
        Parameters:
        pcmBufferSize - the one element array where the required PCM buffer size is saved.
        mp3BufferSize - the one element array where the required MP3 buffer size is saved.

      • encodeBuffer

        public int encodeBuffer(byte[] pPCMBuffer,
               int size,
               byte[] pMP3Buffer)
        Description copied from interface: GenericEncoder
        Encodes a chunk of raw PCM data, if stereo source audio data must be interleaved.

        PCM and MP3 buffers must have the lengths provided by the method GenericEncoder.initEncoding(int[],int[])

        Specified by:
        encodeBuffer in interface GenericEncoder
        Parameters:
        pPCMBuffer - the PCM data to encode.
        size - the number of bytes with PCM data.
        pMP3Buffer - the MP3 buffer to fill with the encoded MP3 audio.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes used to fill the MP3 buffer.

      • encodeFlush

        public int encodeFlush(byte[] pMP3Buffer)
        Description copied from interface: GenericEncoder
        Finalizes the encoding task, any remainder MP3 data in the encoder is flushed to the MP3 buffer.
        Specified by:
        encodeFlush in interface GenericEncoder
        Overrides:
        encodeFlush in class EncoderImpl
        Parameters:
        pMP3Buffer - the MP3 buffer to fill with the encoded MP3 audio.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes used to fill the MP3 buffer.
